nodes.text: Carnus was a male Houk who served Suudaa Nem'ro inside his Palace during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, Carnus was seen inside the Palace where he stood patiently at Nem'ro's side when an unidentified bounty hunter arrived to earn the sponsorship for Nem'ro in the upcoming Great Hunt. When the bounty hunter was tasked to hunt down Huttsbane as the first target, Carnus warned the Hunter that Huttsbane was a skilled warrior that had killed at least one Hutt in his attacks against Nem'ro's people.
Carnus is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Fred Tatasciore.
